page.title: 19FOOTBALL TEAM SWANAGE
page.content: We played Bovington in the finals, the home team!!!. It was very exciting game and we were all thrilled to be playing in the final. Bovington held up well but they were not good enough and we beat them 2-0. We were very excited at winning the final game. This meant we had won the competition. We had our picture taken for the local newspaper and were all very happy. This was the first time our school had entered the six-a-side football competition since 1974 when Saint Mary's became a First School. You can imagine how wonderful we felt at our success. Our school gave us a really lovely party to celebrate our win. The team photograph is now on the wall of our classroom. All the team had a copy of the photograph to take home on the day we were presented with our medals.
